Title: Google Custom Search (Site Search)
Description:
This custom ASP.Net control allows you to quickly implement an internal search engine in your public website using Google Custom Search / Google Site Search.
It embeds the search page in your site, and displays search results in your own layout using XSLT transformations.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This custom ASP.Net control allows you to quickly implement an internal search engine in your public website using Google Custom Search / Google Site Search.
It embeds the search page in your site, and displays search results in your own layout using XSLT transformations.

More information about Google Custom Search:
http://www.google.com/coop/cse/




Orbit One is a software development agency located in Ghent, Belgium.
We specialize in internet facing websites, intranet and extranet applications.
We use technologies such as ASP.Net, SharePoint, Umbraco and Microsoft Dynamics CRM.
http://www.orbitone.com
